content.question: The description of the children’s activity in lines 11-23 most clearly functions as a

choices.label: contrast of unruliness with the precision of the speaker’s companion
digression from dull idleness to colorful activity
transition to the speaker’s own unique perspective
juxtaposition of innocent childhood and adult maturity

content.answer: contrast of unruliness with the precision of the speaker’s companion

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
